text: hamane pahale bhee tumhaare paas yoosuf khule pramaan lekar aa chuke hai, kintu jo kuchh ve lekar tumhaare paas aae the, usake baare mein tum baraabar sandeh mein pade rahe, yahaan tak ki jab unakee mrtyu ho gaee to tum kahane lage, "allaah unake pashchaat kadaapi koee rasool na bhejega." isee prakaar allaah use gumaraahee mein daal deta hai jo maryaadaaheen, sandehon mein padanevaala ho.
